name: Gosu
description:
This abstract strategy board game is a new take on classic game Gomoku. It is played by two teams. Black team starts the game with Spades piece then Red team places Diamonds on an empty intersection of the board. Black team proceeds with Clubs and Red team responds with Hearts.
The winner is the first team to get an unbroken row of five pieces of the same color or four pieces of the same suit horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.
